LanguageData.Constellation_Sagittarius.label: Constellation of the Archer
LanguageData.Constellation_Sagittarius.description: The constellation Sagittarius shines in the sky. Everyone feels steadier in their aim.
LanguageData.Constellation_Hercules.label: Constellation of the Strong
LanguageData.Constellation_Hercules.description: The constellation Hercules shines in the sky. Everyone feels more courage when fighting with melee.
LanguageData.Constellation_Build.label: Constellation of the Level
LanguageData.Constellation_Build.description: The constellation Norma shines in the sky. Everyone feels more adept at building.
LanguageData.Constellation_Art.label: Constellation of the Painter
LanguageData.Constellation_Art.description: The constellation Pictor shines in the sky. Everyone's creativity blossoms forth.
LanguageData.Constellation_Animals.label: Constellation of the Oxen-Driver
LanguageData.Constellation_Animals.description: The constellation Boötes shines in the sky. Everyone feels more confident in handling animals.
LanguageData.Constellation_Plant.label: Constellation of the River
LanguageData.Constellation_Plant.description: The constellation Eridanus shines in the sky. Everyone feels more in tune with plants and nature.
LanguageData.Constellation_Social.label: Constellation of the Sextant
LanguageData.Constellation_Social.description: The constellation Sextans shines in the sky. Everyone feels more inspired like the sailing merchant-kings of ancient times.
LanguageData.Constellation_Craft.label: Constellation of the Furnace
LanguageData.Constellation_Craft.description: The constellation Fornax shines in the sky. Everyone feels a desire to craft ignite within them.
LanguageData.Constellation_Mining.label: Constellation of the Table Mountain
LanguageData.Constellation_Mining.description: The constellation Mensa shines in the sky. Everyone feels as if they could dig through a mountain.
LanguageData.Constellation_Cooking.label: Constellation of the Cup
LanguageData.Constellation_Cooking.description: The constellation Crater shines in the sky. Everyone feels as if they could cook a meal fit for a king.
LanguageData.Constellation_Medicine.label: Constellation of the Serpent
LanguageData.Constellation_Medicine.description: The constellation Serpens shines in the sky. Everyone feels a greater understanding of medicine and anatomy.
LanguageData.Constellation_Intellectual.label: Constellation of the Microscope
LanguageData.Constellation_Intellectual.description: The constellation Microscopium shines in the sky. Everyone feels the scientific secrets of the universe reveal themselves more easily.
LanguageData.Constellation_Shield.label: Constellation of the Shield
LanguageData.Constellation_Shield.description: The constellation Scutum flares in the sky. Everyone feels more reserved in their melee attacks.
LanguageData.Constellation_Lynx.label: Constellation of the Scorpion
LanguageData.Constellation_Lynx.description: The constellation Scorpius flares in the sky. Everyone finds it difficult to focus on their aim.
LanguageData.Constellation_Triangle.label: Constellation of the Peacock
LanguageData.Constellation_Triangle.description: The constellation Pavo flares in the sky. Everyone forgets that form must follow function, construction is sloppier.
LanguageData.Constellation_Clock.label: Constellation of the Clock
LanguageData.Constellation_Clock.description: The constellation Horologium flares in the sky. Everyone feels too bound by time to express creativity.
LanguageData.Constellation_Hydra.label: Constellation of the Wolf
LanguageData.Constellation_Hydra.description: The constellation Lupus flares in the sky. Everyone feels hesitant among animals.
LanguageData.Constellation_Corvus.label: Constellation of the Chamaeleon
LanguageData.Constellation_Corvus.description: The constellation Chamaeleon flares in the sky. Everyone has trouble determining if crops are ripe .
LanguageData.Constellation_Indian.label: Constellation of the Scales
LanguageData.Constellation_Indian.description: The constellation Libra flares in the sky. Everyone is unwilling to try to make a deal, perhaps being too fair.
LanguageData.Constellation_Eridan.label: Constellation of the Fly
LanguageData.Constellation_Eridan.description: The constellation Musca flares in the sky. Everyone has trouble focusing on their crafting projects.
LanguageData.Constellation_Taurus.label: Constellation of the Chisel
LanguageData.Constellation_Taurus.description: The constellation Caelum flares in the sky. Everyone can barely make more than a chip when mining.
LanguageData.Constellation_Coma.label: Constellation of the Lynx
LanguageData.Constellation_Coma.description: The constellation Lynx flares in the sky. Everyone has trouble finding the right ingredients when cooking.
LanguageData.Constellation_Snake.label: Constellation of the Water Serpent
LanguageData.Constellation_Snake.description: The constellation Hydra flares in the sky. Everyone has trouble curing one medical ailment without causing more to arrise.
LanguageData.Constellation_Octans.label: Constellation of the Harp
LanguageData.Constellation_Octans.description: The constellation Lyra flares in the sky. Everyone has trouble keeping their mind clear when trying to research.
